mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT (ID, PWD, NAME, GENDER, BIRTH, TEL, ZIPCODE, ADDR, DETAIL_ADDR, EMAIL, DEPARTMENT, GRADE, ADMISSION_DATE, JOIN_DATE, STATUS) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{addr}, #{detail_addr}, #{email}, #{department}, #{grade}, #{admission_date}, SYSDATE(), #{status})

INSERT INTO PROFESSOR (ID, PWD, NAME, GENDER, BIRTH, TEL, ZIPCODE, ADDR, DETAIL_ADDR, EMAIL, LESSON, JOIN_DATE, STATUS, INDATE, TYPE) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{addr}, #{detail_addr}, #{email}, #{lesson}, SYSDATE(), #{status}, #{indate}, #{type})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STUDENT WHERE pwd = #{pwd} AND Id = #{id}
select c.C_NUMBER , c.C_NAME , c.C_PROF_NAME , c.C_TIME , c.C_DAY , ac.ID , ac.NAME from class c join attend_class ac on c.C_NUMBER = ac.C_NUMBER where ac.ID = #{id}
